nodes.text: The Calaron sector was a sector in the Outer Rim Territories. Planets in the Calaron included Akrit'tar, Baroonda, F'tral, Fwillsving, Jerijador, Koozebane, Kubindi, Morvogodine, Darvannis, and Norval II
By the time of the Great Galactic War, the Calaron sector was part of Hutt Space.

Calaron sector was created for the computer game Star Wars: Rebellion, which placed ten planets in the sector; however, Rebellion made numerous errors in its cartographic placement. As such, Leland Chee, Keeper of the Holocron, has stated that when its placements conflict with existing canon placements, they are overridden. In the case of the Calaron sector, this applies to several planets, including Kessel and Ithor. Kessel has been placed in the Kessel sector, and Ithor has been placed in the Ottega sector.
